item.title: [ 78] /lag/ LA Lakers General
item.description:
So, it happened AGAIN. We can blame injuries, we can blame fatigue, we can praise Minnesota’s effort, but the truth is it's simply not enough. Tactics, determination you name it, it all stinks.

Don't get me wrong, I still have full faith in JJ and the lads, but MASSIVE reinforcements are desperately needed this summer. Otherwise I'm not very optimistic about this upcoming season, or our chances in the play-in tournament for that matter. Not playing like this. What do you think, /lag/?
#LeBronIN or #LeChokeOUT?

item.title: [ 69] Let’s List Everything Wrong With Oblivion DEmastered
item.description:
>removed firstperson sitting
>removed firstperson horseriding
>removed dodgeroll
>removed racial heights
>removed gender
>removed ability to strike bodies
>removed iconic Medieval painted world artstyle
>removed iconic NPC faces and appearances
>removed vampirism appearance changes
>can’t brew potions too quickly without crashing game
>can’t cast light spells in firstperson
>Skyrimized health regeneration
>Skyrimized HUD
>Skyrimized encumbrance
>Everything is wrapped in an ugly Unreal Engine ass textures
>Some NPCs classic voices and dialog have been changed
>Combat and movement/general gameplay feels stiff and wooden
>All text and items and names have ugly ass black boxes around them now
>Dialog camera has an ugly ass skip border at the bottom permanently
>Objects have disgusting and jarring and immersion breaking glow when you hover over them.

item.title: [ 46] /nrl/ - Rugby League General - Womens State of Origin + Magic Round eve
item.description:
No Dudds edition

WOMENS STATE OF ORIGIN
>GAME 1
Queensland v New South Wales
7:45pm AEST on Ch 9 and 9NOW
Replay 10:00pm AEST on Fox and Kayo
Suncorp Stadium, Brisbane
1.98-1.86
>QLD are defending champions after winning the first ever three-game Women's State of Origin series. Suncorp Stadium is the venue for 2025's opener. Jasmine Peters, Jada Ferguson, Rory Owen and Tavarna Papalii will be making their respective Origin debuts for Queensland in Game 1. Plenty of established stars have also been named, including Golden Boot winner Tarryn Aiken, Tamika Upton, Shenae Ciesiolka and Julia Robinson. Veteran halfback Ali Brigginshaw has been selected at halfback. New NSW Blues Women’s coach John Strange has named four debutants in a 20-player squad for Game One of the 2025 State of Origin series. Making their Origin debuts are Abbi Church, Jayme Fressard, Ellie Johnston, and Jocelyn Kelleher. Four more players return to the Origin stage after previous campaigns: Kennedy Cherrington, Shaylee Bent, and Jesse Southwell last featured in 2023, while Kirra Dibb was part of the 2022 winning side and named on the extended bench in 2024. Isabelle Kelly will captain the team, with Tiana Penitani Gray serving as vice-captain. The squad includes 11 players from last year’s Blues side that lost the series 2-1, along with nine Jillaroos who helped defeat England in Las Vegas earlier this year.
QLD 1-12 2.70
QLD 13+ 5.30
NSW 1-12 2.70
NSW 13+ 5.10
QLD +1.5 1.85 NSW -1.5 1.96

Original filename: no_dudds.jpg

item.title: [ 42] Is it weird to wonder if chicks ever had crushes on obscure cartoon characters?
item.description:
Like, I wonder if there were any chicks out there who would have crushed hard over the Willie Brothers or some shit.
As a straight dude, is that weird to wonder?
I think it's 'cause I see chicks obsess and have crushes over pretty fucking weird characters; like Mewtwo or Aslan or some shit. And I know that as dudes we sometimes obsess over very minor female characters, so I wonder if the same applies to women.

item.title: [285] Marathon Leak
item.description:
>45 dollars on launch
>20 dollar battlepass, 1.99 to bump up a point on the track
>character skins are bought in a funmoney currency but roughly equate to 18 dollars per character skin
>mods cannot be removed from weapons because the spaghetti code will break a dozen other things if this is changed
>the fourth map will unlock after players solve a series of puzzles across the launch maps
>The fourth map has alien enemies and is closer to Gambit from Destiny and much more difficulty
>Seasons last 120 days
>Upon the end of the season skins, emblems and weapon skins are retained but everything else including map unlocks, inventory/vault expansions and contracts will all be wiped and reset
>The game is intended for one pvp interaction per match. Not per player but per match.
>The reason there is no shrinking battle royale bubble or larger amount of players is because the engine could not take it, it is very unstable so the game has shrunk in scope multiple times to keep it running smoothly
>The current alpha build is approximately 6 weeks behind the devbuild
>There are four seasons planned for its first year of service as of right now

Original filename: Marathon.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 41] /de3/ - DALL-E 3 General
item.description:
Last thread >>105086382

>What is DALL-E 3?
It's a text-to-image generator made by OpenAI.

>Links
https://www.bing.com/images/create
https://designer.microsoft.com/image-creator
https://copilot.microsoft.com/

>Download links for latest Bing and Designer Slop scripts:
https://pastebin.com/raw/bk33MxxG (embed)

>Instructions and download for BIC EDIT script:
https://rentry.org/bicedit

>How does it work on Bing?
In Bing's Image Creator, "boosts" are used to speed up the image creation process, each user starts with 15 boosts. When you use a boost, the AI creates your image quickly. If you run out of boosts, the image waiting time can increase, usually if you refresh the page you can get the picture earlier.

>Prompt Generator
https://tipseason.com/dalle-prompt-generator

https://files.catbox.moe/o4yihf.png
https://files.catbox.moe/320rm1.png
https://files.catbox.moe/8gge6o.png
https://files.catbox.moe/dcokjf.png

>Related Boards
>>>/v/dall-e
>>>/co/dall-e
>>>/trash/aibf
>>>/aco/dall
>>>/tg/slop

item.title: [ 35] Totalitarian UK now obsessed with a tree
item.description:
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/articles/crm30yen1dlo

Having shown no concern over migrants raping kids and passing them around like a peace pipe at a pow wow, the Brits are now obsessed with some piece of shit tree that got cut down, affecting absolutely no one. Two men accused of chopping down the famous Sycamore Gap tree (cos Britain's that dull that a tree is famous) kept a wedge as a trophy in a felling that prosecutors described as a "moronic mission".

The tree had stood for more than 100 years in a dip on Hadrian's Wall in Northumberland before it was felled overnight on 27 September 2023, Newcastle Crown Court heard. To ensure that absolutely every single sub atomic particle of freedom is removed from British citizens lives, the press and the courts have busied themselves with throwing the full force of the law at these 2 nobodies.who now wished they had just raped some kids instead and faced only a small fine and community service. There are reports of legal experts and police being removed from investigating cases of stabbings and rampant phone thefts to manage the workload of the tree felling case.

Daniel Michael Graham, 39, from Carlisle, and Adam Carruthers, 32, from Wigton in Cumbria, each deny two counts of criminal damage relating to the tree and the Roman wall because... well cos it's a fucking tree and no one fucking cares.

Opening the case to jurors, prosecutor Richard Wright KC said the tree, which was held in "high affection" by many, had been chopped down in just minutes and the accused had "loved" the outrage caused. Local migrants were asked their opinions on the matter but were too busy counting the fat stacks of cash they'd received from the UK government.

The efforts to make a real time version of 1984 continues.....

Original filename: proxy-image.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 69] /tpg/ /rcg/ - Theme Park & Roller Coaster General
item.description:
"Dueling Divisions" Universal Creative vs. Disney Imagineering Edition

>Last Thread: >>2777872

>What is this thread? Why are there two companies?
Disney parks were initially founded as a way to celebrate the culture and history of America and provide middle class families with a fun-filled immersive experience. While theme parks are the main focus of these threads (and the title of the general) there is also discussion on other roller coasters & rides, as well as the parks themselves and trip planning too. That's where /rcg/ comes in.
>Can I talk about Disney/Universal parks in this thread?
Absolutely! Disney and Universal are currently competing for the Orlando theme park market and beyond! Universal is opening new resorts all around the US and new continents!

Thread Pro Tip: Talk about theme parks!

Park Crowd Tracker:
>https://queue-times.com/en-US/parks

Roller Coaster Database:
>https://rcdb.com/

Amusement Park News Sites:
>https://www.themeparkinsider.com/
>https://www.screamscape.com/
>https://www.coaster101.com/

Disney Park News:
>https://www.wdwnt.com/
>https://www.wdwmagic.com/
>https://www.allears.net
>https://www.mousesteps.com

Epic Universe is almost ready to open so get yourself hype on this insanely beautiful and high tech theme park!

Original filename: Screenshot_218.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 47] /tcg/ Trading Card Game General
item.description:
Long Nap Edition

>I want to learn the game, where do I begin?
Download PTCGL at https://tcg.pokemon.com/en-us/tcgl
The game has a quick tutorial and a bunch of decent decks to get you started against other beginners or against the AI. Some of those decks are very close to meta too. You can also go to your local game store and see if people are playing Pokémon.

>I know how to play, how do I make my own deck?
You have a decent beginner's guide at https://www.justinbasil.com/guide
There's also the old /tcg/ guide at https://imgur.com/a/W4NkOu6
After that, look up meta decks and try to reverse engineer them to see how things work.

>Where to find meta decks?
For big irl events, go to https://limitlesstcg.com/decks
For online events, go to https://play.limitlesstcg.com/decks?game=PTCG
For japanese events, go to https://pokecabook.com/archives/1417

Previous thread: >>57714605

Old /tcg/ pastebin: https://pastebin.com/Ge95YuMA

Original filename: 88735608_p0.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [106] White House rips ‘hostile and political’ move by Bezos
item.description:
https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/us-politics/amazon-tariff-prices-trump-response-b2741552.html

The White House claimed on Tuesday that Amazon was acting in a “hostile and political” manner by choosing to display how much President Donald Trump’s tariffs would increase the cost of imported goods.

With consumers’ concerns growing about the impact of tariffs on costs, the e-commerce giant has decided to display the amount Trump’s aggressive policy will add to the price of products on its website, Punchbowl News reported on Tuesday.

While it may help consumers understand where the costs are coming from, it has angered Trump, a recent ally of Amazon founder Jeff Bezos.

“This is a hostile and political act by Amazon,” White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt told reporters on Tuesday morning after speaking with the president. “Why didn’t Amazon do this when the Biden administration hiked inflation to the highest level in 40 years?” Leavitt added.

Leavitt claimed the news was “not a surprise” and pointed to a December 2021 Reuters report, which she described as “recently reported,” which said Amazon “partnered with a China propaganda arm.”

“So this is another reason why Americans should buy American,” Leavitt added.

At the time of that reporting, Amazon insisted it adhered to all laws and regulations in the countries in which it operates, including China.

The Independent has reached out to Amazon for comment.

Since winning the election in November, Bezos appeared to be cozying up to Trump, giving his inaugural fund $1 million, attending Trump’s inauguration and re-directing the editorial section of The Washington Post to focus on defending personal liberties and free markets.

As recently as this week, Trump had touted that Bezos and other billionaire allies “have been great.”

Original filename: Jeff Bezos Ghislaine Maxwell.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 60] Trump Saves Canadian Democracy
item.description:
This is a great day for Canada as we prepare for the global war or authoritarianism.

https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cn4jd39g8y1o

Mark Carney's Liberal Party is expected to win enough seats in the House of Commons to form a government in Canada. However, they are still short of the majority they wanted in the House of Commons.

Carney is set to remain prime minister, having only assumed the role in early March following Justin Trudeau's resignation.

His main rival, Conservative leader Pierre Poilievre, is projected to have lost his own seat as has Jagmeet Singh, leader of the New Democratic Party (NDP).

Carney's Liberals are leading in 168 seats but would need 172 for a majority.


Six months ago Canada looked like it was headed for a inevitable win for Poilievre and the Progressive Conservative party. The Liberals were widely hated and the New Democratic Party was floundering. But as soon as Trump got in office, Poilievre seeming to align with Trump in terms of policy especially after war had been declared made hos popularity plummet. Thanks to Trump ruining America in his first 100 days, Canada saw how terrible that path is and is ready to fight back. It's now master banker versus master felon draft dodging criminal and the future looks bright.

item.title: [ 39] Democrats try to raise marriage age to 18 minimum, Missouri Republicans SEETHE!
item.description:
https://www.kctv5.com/2025/04/24/bill-raise-legal-marriage-age-18-sparks-fiery-debate-missouri-house/
Child marriage is still legal in 37 states, according to Girls Not Brides. That’s when one or both people in the marriage is under 18. Thursday, Missouri got one step closer to eliminating child marriage.

The Missouri House approved a bill that, among many other things, would raise the minimum age for marriage to 18, but not without a fiery debate.

The minimum age to get married in Missouri was raised from 15 to 16 years old in 2018. Teens wishing to get married have to get permission from at least one parent and their spouse has to be younger than 21.

The bill needs one final vote from the Senate to be sent to the governor. In previous votes, only one senator stood against raising the age for marriage, Ash Grove Republican Sen. Mike Moon. This bill passed out of the Senate last year, but it couldn’t get enough support from the House.

For years, some lawmakers have tried to raise the legal age for marriage in Missouri. They claim allowing 16 and 17-year-olds to get married leads to domestic abuse, marriages riddled with uneven power dynamics and even allows sex trafficking.

“As the only child welfare professional on either side of this chamber, I can tell you that I’ve gone through this bill and it will do nothing but protect children,” said Lee’s Summit Democratic Rep. Kari Ingle. “If you walk on this bill, it’s definitely because you support child marriage.”

Several lawmakers stood up today in defense of young marriage with stories of grandparents who made it work at a young age. Poplar Bluff Republican Rep. Hardy Billington claims raising the age for marriage will increase abortions. In total, 33 lawmakers did not vote in favor of the bill.

item.title: [ 58] Is modern marriage the worst investment of all time? >Have to pay 40k-50k on
item.description:
Is modern marriage the worst investment of all time?

>Have to pay 40k-50k on a wedding.
>Have to buy at least a 10k ring that is actually worthless.
>If your wife works she is highly likely to cheat on you with co-workers during the relationship
>If she stays at home you need to financially support her forever.
>Wife will pressure you into buying expensive cars, buying designer shit, go on trips etc.
>No fault divorces
>half your stuff goes to her.
>If you have kids you will be forced to pay child support even if the kids are actually not yours.

Why the fuck would anyone do this? The only financial benefit is slightly lower taxes.

item.title: [308] /wdg/ - Friendly Web Development General
item.description:
Updoot your site edition.

*** Please be civil, notice the "Friendly" in the thread subject ***

>Free beginner resources to get started with HTML, CSS and JS
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn - MDN is your friend for web dev fundamentals
https://web.dev/learn/ - Guides by Google, you can also learn concepts like Accessibility, Responsive Design etc
https://eloquentjavascript.net/Eloquent_JavaScript.pdf - A modern introduction to JavaScript
https://javascript.info/ - Quite a good JS tutorial
https://flukeout.github.io/ - Learn CSS selectors in no time
https://flexboxfroggy.com/ and https://cssgridgarden.com/ - Learn flex and grid in CSS
https://roadmap.sh/roadmaps?g=Web+Development - Guided beginner roadmaps

>Resources for backend languages
https://nodejs.org/en/learn/getting-started/introduction-to-nodejs - An intro to Node.js
https://www.phptutorial.net - A PHP tutorial
https://dev.java/learn/ - A Java tutorial
https://rentry.org/htbby - Links for Python and Go

>Resources for miscellaneous areas
https://github.com/bradtraversy/design-resources-for-developers - List of design resources
https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials - Usually the best guides for everything server related

>Need help? Create an example and post the link
https://jsfiddle.net - if you need help with HTML/CSS/JS
https://3v4l.org - if you need help with PHP/HackLang
https://codesandbox.io - if you need help with React/Angular/Vue

/wdg/ may or may not welcome app development discussion. You can post and see what the response is.
Some app technologies of course have overlap with web dev, like React Native, Electron, and Flutter.

We have our own website: https://wdg-one.github.io

Submit your project progress updates using this format in your posts, the scraper will pick it up:

:: my-project-title ::
dev:: anon
tools:: PHP, MySQL, etc.
link:: https://my.website.com
repo:: https://github.com/user/repo
progress:: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet

Previous: >>105006502
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 30] Hey voyagers, The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread
item.description:
Hey voyagers,

The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread open for suggestions:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/trv/ is a slow board, so don't expect immediate responses. CHECK THE CATALOG – you might find threads already discussing topics you're interested in.

Before asking for suggestions, tell /trv/ about your:
>Budget
>Interests
>Level of understanding of the local language(s)
This makes it easier to give quality advice. Of course, keep your posts travel related.

For all other matters:
General culture questions >>>/int/
Politics discussion >>>/pol/
Transportation discussion >>>/n/
Outdoors-related discussion >>>/out/

For more information about safety, planning and other miscellaneous topics, check out the pastebin:

GENERAL INFO:
https://pastebin.com/yR1SAr3s

Note: Discussions of prostitution or sex tourism are not permitted on /trv/.

Original filename: trv.png

item.title: [ 71] Tried to summit Mount Washington today. A group of, older men, completely cock
item.description:
Tried to summit Mount Washington today. A group of, older men, completely cock blocked me while I was pretty far up. They told me I had no business being there alone with the gear I had. I'm so fucking fed up man. I ran into this same fucking issue earlier this year when trying to do Mount Katahdin via the Knife Edge and a fucking park ranger refused to let me continue up to it. I'm so fucking over hiking. This sport has been nothing but pain with all the fucking rich boomers gatekeeping everything cool.
